name: YourStory.in
tag_list: india, indian, indian-startups, indian-entrepreneurs, tech-startups, mobile-startups, cloud-startups, social-ventures
overview:
India’s Biggest Platform for Startups, Entreprenuers, Business Ideas, Product Reviews, Small Business, News and Resources.

Founded in 2008, YourStory.in has grown into India’s biggest and comprehensive media platform for entrepreneurs and startups having a strong readership of over 300,000 unique visitors per month. YourStory.in in a short span of time has featured over 4000 entrepreneurs and startups across sector and continues to provide 360 degree online visibility through extensive profile coverage, news coverage, social media, blogs, forum, access to investors and business opportunities. YourStory.in’s audience includes entrepreneurs, startup enthusiasts, investors, developers, students, corporates, influencers, PR and advertising agencies, bloggers and journalists. Research reports published by YourStory.in are regularly picked up by leading print media houses.

YourStory.in Flagship Offline Events TechSparks – India’s biggest tech startup discovery and showcase event. Successfully carried out for two consecutive years in partnership with Sequoia Capital, Microsoft, Canaan Partners, Intel, Google, Amazon, IBM, National Instruments and CNBC-TV18. Engaging with over 2,000 entrepreneurs and organized city-wise events in 5 major Indian metros.

Sociopreneurship – India’s first social and green tech startup showcase event supported by Harvard Business Review, Unitus Capital and Madhura Microfinance.

E-Sparks – India’s first E-commerce startup showcase event, supported by Microsoft Azure, Sequoia Capital, One97, MartJack and Intuit - txtWeb. Worked with over 250 early stage e-commerce entrepreneurs in a span of 3 months.

Cloud Conclave – India’s first platform showcasing innovative cloud startups, supported by Amazon Web Services and keynote delivered by Dr. Werner Vogels, CTO, Amazon. Engaging over 120 cloud ventures in a span of 2 months.

Startup Pitch Session with Vinod Khosla – As part of NASSCOM Product Conclave 2011, YourStory.in hosted a closed door startup pitch session with Vinod Khosla and few clean-tech entrepreneurs selected from across India.

App On Cloud Conferences – Two city cloud conference showcasing the potential of cloud computing to early stage startups for scenarios that target end consumers using - Mobile, Social or Consumer Web Apps, in partnership with Windows Azure, Nexus Venture Partners and Mumbai Angels.

YourStory.in Flagship Online Campaigns

MPEC - India’s first online entrepreneur popular poll contest supported by Sun Microsystems.

EduStars - India’s first online platform to support emerging education startups in India, supported by Accel Partners and Intel AppUp.
